original_text:
Your domain was on the high seas;
    your builders brought your beauty to perfection.
korean_text: 네 땅이 바다 가운데에 있음이여 너를 지은 자가 네 아름다움을 온전하게 하였도다

sentences.original_text: Your domain was on the high seas
your builders brought your beauty to perfection
sentences.korean_translation: 당신의 건축가들은 당신의 아름다움을 완벽하게 만들었습니다
